chap2-14: mātrāsparśāstu kaunteya śītosnasukhaduhkhadāh | āgamāpāyino’nityā stāmstitiksasva bhārata ॥ 2-14 ॥
chap2-20: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyam bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyah | ajo nityah śāśvato’yam purāno na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre॥ 2-20 ॥
chap2-38: sukhaduhkhe same krtvā lābhālābhau jayājayau | tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivam pāpamavāpsyasi ॥ 2-38 ॥
chap2-47: karmanyevādhikāraste mā phalesu kadācana | mā karmaphalaheturbhūrmā te sango’stvakarmani ॥ 2-47 ॥
chap2-63: krodhādbhavati sammohah sammohātsmrtivibhramah | smrtibhramśād buddhināśo buddhināśātpranaśyati ॥ 2-63 ॥
chap4-7: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānirbhavati bhārata | abhyutthānamadharmasya tadātmānam srjāmyaham ॥ 4-7 ॥
chap4-8: paritrānāya sādhūnām vināśāya ca duskrtām | dharmasamsthāpanārthāya sambhavāmi yuge yuge ॥ 4-8 ॥
chap4-9: janma karma ca me divyamevam yo vetti tattvatah | tyaktvā deham punarjanma naiti māmeti so’rjuna ॥ 4-9 ॥
chap4-10: vītarāgabhayakrodhā manmayā māmupāśritāh | bahavo jñānatapasā pūtā madbhāvamāgatāh ॥ 4-10 ॥
chap4-11: ye yathā mām prapadyante tāmstathaiva bhajāmyaham | mama vartmānuvartante manusyāh pārtha sarvaśah ॥ 4-11 ॥
chap4-24: brahmārpanam brahma havirbrahmāgnau brahmanā hutam | brahmaiva tena gantavyam brahmakarmasamādhinā ॥ 4-24 ॥
chap4-33: śreyāndravyamayādyajñājjñānayajñah parantapa | sarvam karmākhilam pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate ॥ 4-33 ॥
chap6-5: uddharedātmanātmānam nātmānamavasādayet | ātmaiva hyātmano bandhurātmaiva ripurātmanah ॥ 6-5 ॥
chap6-35: śrībhagavānuvāca | asamśayam mahābāho mano durnigraham calam | abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyena ca grhyate ॥ 6-35 ॥
chap7-28: yesām tvantagatam pāpam janānām punyakarmanām | te dvandvamohanirmuktā bhajante mām drdhavratāh ॥ 7-28 ॥
chap9-22: ananyāścintayanto mām ye janāh paryupāsate | tesām nityābhiyuktānām yogaksemam vahāmyaham ॥ 9-22 ॥
chap11-18: tvamaksaram paramam veditavyam | tvamasya viśvasya param nidhānam | tvamavyayah śāśvatadharmagoptā | sanātanastvam puruso mato me ॥ 11-18 ॥
chap11-19: anādimadhyāntam anantavīryam | anantabāhum śaśisūryanetram | paśyāmi tvām dīptahutāśavaktram | svatejasā viśvamidam tapantam ॥ 11-19 ॥
chap15-14: aham vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāninām dehamāśritah | prānāpānasamāyuktah pacāmyannam caturvidham ॥ 15-14 ॥
chap16-21: trividham narakasyedam dvāram nāśanamātmanah | kāmah krodhastathā lobhastasmādetattrayam tyajet ॥ 16-21 ॥
chap18-78: yatra yogeśvarah krsno yatra pārtho dhanurdharah | tatra śrīrvijayo bhūtirdhruvā nītirmatirmama ॥ 18-78 ॥
